subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,
Iâ€™m Mrs. Mavis Wanczyk, the mega winner of Seven Hundred Fifty-Eight Million in Mega Millions Jackpot, I am donating to 5 random individuals if you get this email then your email was selected after a spin ball. I have spread most of my wealth over a number of charities and organizations. I have voluntarily decided to donate the Sum of Three Million Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars to you as one of the selected 5, to verify my winnings via YouTube check the page below: https:/ /www.youtube.com/watch?v=7kWnqvJM1mM
Send me your full name, age, address, phone and occupation and a $3.5million check will be issued to you directly from my donation foundation. Reply with this DONATION CODE; RFCJ-4416720 to this email: 
mrsmavislwanczyk382@gmail.com
Hope to make you and your family happy.
Regards,
Mrs. Mavis L. Wanczyk

subject: Re:   Hello,
body:
Hello Mrs. Mavis L. Wanczyk,

Wow, this is such an unexpected surprise! I can't believe my luck. It's so generous of you to share your wealth with others. 

I'm curious, how did you decide to select the recipients of your donation? And what inspired you to donate such a large amount of money?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

P.S: I am not comfortable sharing my personal details over email for security reasons. Is there any other way we could proceed with this?

Best wishes,
Charles
